mapper.sql: SELECT user_id, user_name, user_password, user_department_id, user_phonenumber, user_date FROM user
mapper.insert: insert into user (user_name, user_password, user_department_id, user_phonenumber, user_date) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDepartmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userPhonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate())
mapper.update: update user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_department_id = #{userDepartmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_phonenumber = #{userPhonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_date = sysdate() where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
